name: Arun Singh
title: Good and reliable purchase
review: Bought Samsung Smart TV 32 Inch with Voice support Model No: UA32TE40AAKBXL) (2021) at Rs 16,700/- after all discounts during sale.  Review after 2 weeks of usage:Received the item on Jul 26 and engineer came to install on Jul 27. Delivery, package and installation all was smooth.Pros:1. It contains all the possible connecting options, USB (1 slot) , WiFi, Bluetooth, HDMI (ARC) (2 Slots), LAN, Optical audio out, Cable port, AV port.2. Smooth, lag free and fast working, quick on and off within milliseconds. (Earlier I used Mi Smart TV which used to take between 30-60 seconds to start everytime.3. All application works smoothly except Voot (it works very slow).4. Supports all 3 voice assistance Bixby, Alexa and Google.5. Supports screen sharing from laptop.6. Has got some inbuilt apps for Apple users (not for me).7. Works best pairing with Samsung phonefor screen sharing, remote control, smart things, audio mirroring etc.8. No complaints with picture quality, color, contrast, sharpness etc.Cons:1. Despite 3 voice assistance, none of them works well if I compare with Mi (Google Assistance).
